name: Impact Point
description:
IMPACT POINT! – An ultra satisfying, fast paced, 2-4 player, arena based, multiplayer, top down 2D shooter.


An arena shooter with no respawns. Grab what you can and be the last one standing.


Featuring exciting gunplay, a bunch of weapons, character customization, gore, and fast paced action. What more could you want?

Impact Point was also heavily inspired by retro and vaporwave 80s shooters.
